docs.lead_paragraph: THE twenty-first annual appeal on behalf of the Hundred Neediest Cases of New York City is made today. Nine great charitable organizations have submitted to THE NEW YORK TIMES the most distressing and deserving cases of need now calling to them for help. Out of these cases the Hundred Neediest have been selected. Their stories are told on these pages, simply, without elaboration.

headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; NEW YORK'S ONE HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES TWENTY-FIRST ANNUAL APPEAL NEW YORK'S ONE HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES TWENTY-FIRST ANNUAL APPEAL NEW YORK'S ONE HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES TWENTY-FIRST ANNUAL APPEAL
